scripts.setup: bun install; for d in .claude .codex .cursor; do [ -d "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/$d" ] && mkdir -p "$CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_PATH/$d" && rsync -a "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/$d/." "$CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_PATH/$d/"; done; [ -f "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" ] && cp "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" "$CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_PATH/.env"
